main event: A civilian witness observed a bright, blue-white object in the sky over Las Vegas, Nevada on June 29, 1967.
interesting points: The object was round in shape, like a star, and was two times larger than a normal airplane.
The object moved in a circular pattern, going from west to north to east.
The witness observed the object for about 5 minutes before it faded out and disappeared.
The object did not have any lights or other unusual features. It simply appeared as a bright light in the sky.
The witness was a high school graduate who was considered a fairly reliable observer.
